abstract: The settlement comes nearly three years after the Supreme Court ruled that Visa and MasterCard had violated antitrust rules.
snippet: The settlement comes nearly three years after the Supreme Court ruled that Visa and MasterCard had violated antitrust rules.
lead_paragraph: Visa has agreed to pay $2.1 billion to its credit card rival American Express to settle damages relating to a 2004 antitrust lawsuit.

headline.main: Visa Agrees to Pay Amex $2.1 Billion to Settle Suit
headline.print_headline: Visa Agrees To Pay Amex $2.1 Billion To Settle Suit
